meanings.sent1: The croupiest cough sounded slightly worse than the others in the room.
meanings.sent2: She had the croupiest voice in the choir, but it added a unique charm.
meanings.sent3: The croupiest cat in the neighborhood had a meow that made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His croupiest laugh echoed through the house, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The croupiest clouds in the sky looked like fluffy pillows floating above.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the kids, she had the croupiest cough of them all.
meanings.sent2: The croupiest dog in the park was easily recognizable by its distinctive bark.
meanings.sent3: The croupiest tree in the forest had the most unique shape, standing out among the rest.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was filled with the croupiest flowers, blooming in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The croupiest mountain peak in the range was a sight to behold, towering above the rest.
